data.title: Jason Terry - Men's Lacrosse
data.meta_description: Jason Terry (6) Attack/Midfield  - 2016: Appeared in 13 games, making two starts...recorded 18 points on 15 goals and three assists to go along with six ground balls...tallied
data.text:
2016: Appeared in 13 games, making two starts...recorded 18 points on 15 goals and three assists to go along with six ground balls...tallied two goals, one assist and two ground balls vs. North Greenville (Feb. 13)...scored four goals against Saint Leo (Apr. 1).

2015: Appeared in 16 games, making 14 starts...named SSC Offensive Player of the Week (Feb. 16)...recorded a team-high 37 goals and four assists...his 41 points was second on the team...recorded 20 goals and two assists in FIT's first six games of season...tallied goals in 14 of 16 games...registered 12 multi-goal games, including six hat tricks...scored five goals in the 13-11 season opening win over Tusculum (Feb. 6)...registered five goals and one assists in a 13-12 road victory against No. 15 Lenoir-Rhyne (Feb. 14)...scored four goals in a 21-10 win over Ohio Valley (Mar. 11)...scored three goals and one assist in the 19-11 win over Saint Michael's (Mar. 18).
